title: YouTube will stream 15 MLB games starting in May, and now in 1080p
content:
Google and the Major League Baseball Association reached a deal last year to stream some MLB games via YouTube, and that contract has been renewed for the 2022 season. YouTube will stream 15 MLB games through May and June, and now in higher resolution.

moreâ€¦

The post YouTube will stream 15 MLB games starting in May, and now in 1080p appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: YouTube has confirmed streaming 15 new MLB games as a part of the 2022 season; here are the ones we know of so far.
